properties.Title: Special Weather Statement In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: Local significant snowfall amounts are possible today. Cold west and northwest flow over relatively warm waters of Lake Superior is expected to produce flurries at times heavy and local snow squalls. Total snowfall amounts of 10 to 20 cm with locally higher amounts over higher terrain are possible by tonight. Driving conditions might become difficult due reduced visibility. ### Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to ONstorm@canada.ca or tweet reports using #ONStorm.
Expires: 2019-11-03T06:53:47-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2019-11-02T14:54:47-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.3932329860.2019
Area: Agawa - Lake Superior Park, Searchmont - Montreal River Harbour - Batchawana Bay
properties.Author: Environment Canada

properties.Title: Special Weather Statement In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: Local significant snowfall amounts are expected tonight and Sunday. Cold northwest flow over relatively warm waters of Georgian Bay could produce local flurries heavy at times tonight and Sunday. Places near the bay may see flurries mixed with showers. Total snowfall amounts of 15 cm are possible over higher terrain. Driving conditions might be difficult due to reduced visibility. ### Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to ONstorm@canada.ca or tweet reports using #ONStorm.
Expires: 2019-11-03T06:53:15-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2019-11-02T14:54:15-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.2861821572.2019
Area: Huntsville - Baysville, Town of Parry Sound - Rosseau - Killbear Park, Port Carling - Port Severn, Bracebridge - Gravenhurst
properties.Author: Environment Canada
